app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Karaoke on Demand
app_description: Karaoke On Demand: Sing Your Heart Out Unleash your inner superstar with Karaoke On Demand! Sing along to thousands of hit songs from chart toppers to timeless classics. Whether you re in the mood for today s top tracks or a trip down memory lane we ve got you covered. Key Features: Vast Karaoke Library: Explore thousands of note perfect karaoke songs each accompanied by vibrant MOTION backgrounds. New Songs Weekly: Stay in tune with the latest hits we add new songs every week. Search Made Easy: Find your favorite songs by artist title song key era or explore our themed collections. Multi Genre Magic: Belt out decades of hits spanning Pop Country Rock R B Hip Hop Latin and more! Sing Anywhere: Whether you re at home or on the go Karaoke On Demand is your ticket to singing fun for all ages and moods. Special Categories: Worship: Lift your spirits with soulful worship songs. Holiday: Celebrate the season with festive favorites. Broadway: Feel the drama and excitement of Broadway in your living room. Games More: Karaoke Games: Challenge your friends to karaoke games and test your music trivia knowledge. Free Songs: Enjoy a selection of FREE songs to kickstart your karaoke journey. Chromecast Support: Take the stage on your big screen TV for a living room sing along experience. Kid Friendly: Share sing along fun with your kids featuring traditional nursery rhymes and songs from children s movies bonus: it s great for reading practice! . Get Started: Free Trial: Sign up for a FREE TRIAL and dive into the karaoke world. Subscription Options: Choose from various subscription plans to start after your 3 Day FREE trial. Pricing varies. Auto Renewal: Subscription auto renews but you can cancel anytime at least 24 hours before the trial period ends. Privacy Matters: Your privacy is important to us. Review our Privacy Policy here: https: karaokeondemand.com pages privacy policy Terms of Service: https: karaokeondemand.com pages terms and conditions Karaoke On Demand Where every day is karaoke day! Download Now and Start Singing
